alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 5:57PM PST until January 14 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH HAS BEEN UPGRADED TO A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 1 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations up to 6 inches below 6500 feet and 5 to 12 inches above 6500 feet, west of US-395. Snow accumulations up to 6 inches east of US-395. Winds gusting 30 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 1 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads may become slick and blowing snow may cause lower visibility while driving. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
